ygData.subject: Pixie Strike broken (was Charm)
ygData.msgSnippet: Was Pixie Strike not working properly mentioned in the GZ letter?  Are bards with the capability to sing this song submitting bug reports?  I assume some of
ygData.messageBody:
Was Pixie Strike not working properly mentioned in the GZ letter? Are bards
with the capability to sing this song submitting bug reports? I assume some
of you have. Perhaps if enough people submit a bug report it will get
fixed.

Galtin


> It is not a random duration thing either. The icon on your
> screen disappears when the spell effect expires, whether it's
> 1 second or 10 seconds. But with the bug, the icon appears on
> your screen and you get a message saying "you are unstunned"
> when the icon disappears, despite never having been stunned to
> begin with.
>
> Try it on yourself before you argue otherwise. I'm not making
> this up, I've played with it extensively for the last week or
> two. It *is* broken. This used to be my favorite song before
> they broke it. I don't even keep it loaded now.
>
>
